channel.title: Projects on oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: oneAPI Antispoofing
item.description: Certiface AntiSpoofing use oneAPI for fast decode video for perform liveness detection with inference.

item.title: Hias All oneAPI Classifier
item.description: A HIAS compatible Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia classifier trained using Intel Distribution for Python and Intel Optimized Tensorflow. Uses OpenVINO to deploy the model to a Raspberry Pi and Neural Compute Stick 2 for inference on the edge.

item.title: Open Gesture for African Sign Language
item.description: This project provides Python code to recognize African Sign Language gestures for numbers using OpenCV AI Kit: OAKâ€”D depth cameras. Additionally, this project showcases the utility of convolutional neural networks as a key component of real-time gesture classification pipelines using Intel OpenVINO.

item.title: Cleansweep
item.description: CleanSweep.AI uses the OpenVINO toolkit to optimize the processing of the object detection model to detect the scattared garbage from the input video.

item.title: Lunar Model OneAPI
item.description: Our project lunar api as established in the documentation uses Segmentation model that is developed using CNN in a U-net Architecture.

item.title: Breast Cancer With oneAPI
item.description: Logistic regression can identify important predictors of breast cancer using odds ratios and generate confidence intervals that provide additional information for decision-making. Model

item.title: Smart Garbage Segregation
item.description: Image classification for recycling refers to the use of machine learning algorithms to automatically classify images of waste materials, such as plastic, paper, and metal, into their respective categories.
